name: Blockworks Daily
title: Final Call For Vip Group Discounts Utf8b4oct Das Nyc
text:
Synopsis
The Digital Asset Summit (DAS) in New York represents a critical inflection point for institutional crypto adoption, with the U.S. entering a potentially more crypto-friendly regulatory environment.

Key Insights
- Event is 34 days away and has limited VIP tickets (less than 20 remaining)
- The summit is positioned as a key networking event for institutional crypto stakeholders
- U.S. is described as entering its "most pro-crypto era yet"
- Institutional crypto adoption is reportedly accelerating
- Crypto market dynamics are currently in a state of significant transition
- The event will feature key firms, policymakers, and investors shaping the crypto industry
- VIP passes cost $2,399 and include exclusive networking opportunities
- Group ticket discounts (25% off for 10+ people) are ending soon
